channel.title: [317][508][525]Waves Isle Development [525][508][317]
channel.description:
This Is A Project That I Have Made. It Will Contain a 317 a 508 and a 525
This Is Going To Be As Big As Battlescape But You Do NOT Have To Buy Anything The Only Thing We Would Want Is A Donation Done: Full Desert 317 85% Working Rev (just need magic projectiles) 317 7 New Mini Games 317 12 New Places 317 Npc In Ever Town 317 Every Skill Works 317 100% pk points exchange 317 Modified Player.java Big Time 317 100% Working Castle Wars 317 Great Pking System 317 Every Npc Has A Quest, Shops, Or Something Surprising Waiting For You. 317 50% Tut Island (need to find cornets for underground combat training) 317 New Items Never See Before 317 Npc Vs Npc 0% (i really need this but all my codes have failed so far) 317 100% Working Wildy 317 Adding new never before seen features 317 Easy To Use 317 Player Combat 317
Bounty Hunter 100% 508 Clan Wars 45% 508 Item Wield And Special 100% 508 Report System 508 Help Desk (thank you mithscape) But Added In Diffrent Area 508 Npc Combat 100% Pking 100% (great pking) 508 Player Control Panel 508 Donator Stats 508 Teleporting System 100% 508 Player Magic 100% (muilty barrage) (all spells work) (Wonderful system) 508 Range System 100% (D Bow Hit 2 Times) (all weapons are like they should be) 508 Melee System 100% (Every Weapons Works) (Every Thing That Should Have A Special) 508 Dragon Claws 100% 508 Working On More Features (feel free to suggest) 508 Lag free 508
Bounty Hunter 65% 525 Teleporting System 100% (lumb to lumb) (varrock to varrock ect..) 525 Pvp Levels 100% 525 Spec Bar 100% Working 525 Every Special Weapon Has A Special To It 525 100% Working Wildy, mage bank ect... 525 75% working wildy ditch 525 Working on npc dialog and combat 525 And Feel To suggest
317: The 317 is going to have lots of features. you can: 85% desert ( need to add more npc and need to add fly carpet 50% done) Every Town Has A Npc With A Adverture Waiting pk castle wars train view requirements for items costume clan wars lots of mini games custom items npc dont noclip and noclip following is fixed. and lots more This Will Have A Economy
This Is What Im Working On Right Now.
508: The 508 Is Going To Be Mainly About Pking You Start Out With Combat 138 You can do almost anything This Will Be A Fun Server With 1/2 economy considering you have to buy weapons but don't have to train
Not Done.
525: The 525 Is Going To Be Pvp. It Will Have No Economy With 60% Bh Full Pvp In Every City/town You Can Pickup Any Items And Fight With Them. With Real Weapons That Jagex Made Like Dragon Claws Statics Hammer Vesta and much more
No Train On This Server.
Started.
Here Are Some Pics.
[IMG]http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu59/dude_07_2009/508boun.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu59/dude_07_2009/rev.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu59/dude_07_2009/desterrt.jpg[/img]
I Will Have More Pic's
If You Want To Support Us Then Add This In Ur Signature.
[IMG]http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu59/dude_07_2009/317support.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu59/dude_07_2009/sup.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu59/dude_07_2009/Dragonscape0006-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu59/dude_07_2009/Dragonscape0020.png[/img]
This Will Be Updated.

item.title: [317][508][525]Waves Isle Development [525][508][317]
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

No offense but the pretty effects aren’t what matters. You need to be more precise about the information. It could look pretty, but could crash 50 times an hour. See what I’m saying?

Also, your text is unappealing. It would get more attention if you used more spacing, line breaks, bold/italic font and maybe some color.

Just a suggestion!

GOOD LUCK!

Read full topic

@sportpirate wrote:

Yea But All 3 Server Use Different Methods.
There Are Some Features On 1 Server That The Others Don’t Have.
And Each Version Is Coded Differently.

Thanks For The Advice Any Way.

And Lol It’s Easy To Edit Like That Just Get Photoscape (not a server its a editor program)

Read full topic

item.title: [317][508][525]Waves Isle Development [525][508][317]
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Advice:

Make all 3 servers have the exactly the same layout. By this I mean same class names in the same directories, same variable names, same method names etc.

But for each server use the appropriate packet and stream numbers to work.

This way you will be able to easily update each version at the same time.

Read full topic
